jWrite - a really simple JSON writer
====================================

All the code is in jWrite.c / jWrite.h

main.c is a simple command-line test.


Read comments in the source: jWrite.h

Compiled on VisualStudio 2010 as plain old C

run Release\jWrite.exe in windows 'DOS box' to see test output.


Article on codeproject: 
    http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/887604/jWrite-a-really-simple-JSON-writer-in-C

TonyWilk
17mar2015
